metadata.title: SpectraAnalyze-EnrichNetworkEntities
metadata.description: This playbook will enrich a network entities (IP addresses, URLs, and domain names) with information from a Spectra Analyze appliance. A comment will be added to the incident with details about the entity.
Name of the playbook (Logic Apps resources) which will be created

inputs.name: url comment
inputs.value:
@{concat(substring(item()?['Url'], 0, indexOf(item()?['Url'], '.')),'[.]',substring(item()?['Url'], add(indexOf(item()?['Url'], '.'), 1), sub(length(item()?['Url']), add(indexOf(item()?['Url'], '.'), 1))))}@{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_URL_1')?['classification']}@{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_URL_1')?['reason']}malicious: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_URL_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['malicious']}
undetected: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_URL_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['undetected']}
clean: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_URL_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['clean']}
total: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_URL_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['total']}

inputs.name: domain comment
inputs.value:
@{replace(item()?['DomainName'], '.', '[.]')}malicious: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_domain_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['malicious']}
undetected: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_domain_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['undetected']}

unknown: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_domain_1')?['downloaded_files_statistics']['unknown']}
suspicious: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_domain_1')?['downloaded_files_statistics']['suspicious']}
known: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_domain_1')?['downloaded_files_statistics']['goodware']}
total: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_a_domain_1')?['downloaded_files_statistics']['total']}

inputs.name: ip comment
inputs.value:
@{item()?['Address']}malicious: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_an_IP_address_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['malicious']}
undetected: @{body('Retrieve_information_for_an_IP_address_1')?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['undetected']}
